title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB: When I click the SaveAs icon next to the Save icon, a dialog comes up. After browsing for a valid container location and typing the filename without the extension, I click Ok. The Navigator shows that the file has been added in the specified location, but there is no file extension shown.
EB: After clicking Ok in the SaveAs dialog, the saved file should have the same file type as the original file. The file icon should also remain as the java file icon instead of changing to a generic file icon.
SR:
1) Open an existing java file.
2) Make modifications to the file.
3) Click the SaveAs icon next to the Save icon.
4) In the SaveAs dialog, browse for a valid container location.
5) Type the filename without the extension.
6) Click Ok to save the file.
7) Verify that the saved file has the same file type as the original file and the icon remains as the java file icon.
